description: Two goals in the first seven minutes help Peterborough see off Rochdale and move within two points of the play-off places.
title: Peterborough United 2-1 Rochdale
maintext:
A lightning start saw Peterborough defeat Rochdale and move within two points of the League One play-offs.
Harry Beautyman headed in Michael Smith's right-wing cross and Christian Burgess bundled in Joe Newell's corner as Posh led 2-0 within seven minutes.
Rochdale hit back when full-back Joe Rafferty rifled in the first league goal of his career from 25 yards.
Dale played the final minutes with 10 men when one of their three subs, Calvin Andrew, went off injured.
Peterborough moved up to 10th, while Rochdale dropped to 15th, seven points above the relegation places.
